aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.body: Assalamualaikum. My name is Annashrul, and I am a Software Developer with extensive experience in the industry since 2016. I have a strong creative drive and a high level of dedication to developing innovative and high-quality software solutions. Throughout my career, I have successfully completed various projects of different scales and complexities. My ability to solve problems, communicate effectively, and collaborate within teams has enabled me to achieve goals and exceed expectations. I possess expertise in multiple programming languages and am skilled in using various frameworks. Additionally, I have a broad knowledge of operating systems, databases, and software development principles. I am a quick learner and always eager to explore new things. I am confident that I can make a significant contribution to your team.
